title: WTB: Lower Grade T206 Cobb Any Pose
author: mjsilvey80

posts.post_title: WTB: Lower Grade T206 Cobb Any Pose
posts.post_content: Looking for any or all. Prefer something in the 3 or less range. Not overly concerned about back damage. Will consider "A"s, if front is presentable. Thanks!
Bump. Still looking for everything, except for the bat on.
